movies.title: Dakota
movies.plot: A Dutch pilot with a real passion for flying risks everything to keep his DC3/Dakota plane in the air. Excellent attention to detail and the beautiful backdrop of the Caribbean make this seldom seen much loved Dutch classic well worth watching.
movies.simplePlot: A Dutch pilot with a real passion for flying risks everything to keep his DC3/Dakota plane in the air. Excellent attention to detail and the beautiful backdrop of the Caribbean make this ...

biography.bio: Kees Brusse was born on February 26, 1925 in Rotterdam, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands as Cornelius Brusse. He is known for his work on Ciske de Rat (1955), Dokter Pulder zaait papavers (1975) and De dijk is dicht (1950). He was married to Joan st. Clair, Sonja Boerrigter, Marlou Peters, Mieke Verstraete and Pam Ingenegeren. He died on December 9, 2013 in Laren, Netherlands.
biography.name: Kees Brusse

biography.birthName: Monica Maria Theresia van de Ven
biography.bio: Monique van de Ven was born on July 28, 1952 in Zeeland, Noord-Brabant, Netherlands as Monica Maria Theresia van de Ven. She is an actress and director, known for Spangen (1999), Turkish Delight (1973) and Dokter Deen (2012). She has been married to Edwin de Vries since 1991. They have two children. She was previously married to Jan de Bont.
biography.name: Monique van de Ven

biography.bio: Willeke van Ammelrooy was born on April 5, 1944 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Willy Geertje van Ammelrooij. She is an actress and director, known for The Lake House (2006), Antonia's Line (1995) and The Lift (1983). She has been married to Marco Bakker since November 20, 1989.
biography.name: Willeke van Ammelrooy

biography.bio: Diana Dobbelman was born on March 16, 1939 in Berg en Dal, Gelderland, Netherlands. She is an actress, known for Black Book (2006), Goede tijden, slechte tijden (1990) and Bobby and the Ghost Hunters (2013).
biography.name: Diana Dobbelman

biography.bio: Dora van der Groen was born on March 10, 1927 in Antwerp, Belgium. She was an actress and director, known for Antonia's Line (1995), Pauline and Paulette (2001) and Minder dood dan de anderen (1992). She was married to Wies Andersen and Tone Brulin. She died on November 8, 2015 in Antwerp.
biography.name: Dora van der Groen

biography.bio: Harcourt Curacao was born on May 16, 1930 in Curacao as Alphonse Harcourt Nicholls. He was an actor, known for Stowaway Girl (1957), Dakota (1974) and White Fire (1953). He died on February 4, 1994 in Barnet, London, England.
biography.name: Harcourt Curacao

biography.bio: Frank Davelaar is an actor, known for Dakota (1974).
biography.name: Frank Davelaar

biography.bio: Helmert Woudenberg was born on February 15, 1945 in Elspe, Germany. He is an actor, known for Matterhorn (2013), Flikken Maastricht (2007) and Polleke (2003).
biography.name: Helmert Woudenberg

biography.bio: Wim de Meijer was born on February 16, 1937 in The Hague, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands as Wilhelmus Edmundus Marie De Meyer. He was an actor, known for Soldier of Orange (1977), De graaf van Monte Cristo (1972) and A Question of Silence (1982). He was married to Carletta Banting. He died on April 9, 1993.
biography.name: Wim de Meijer

biography.bio: Bob Verstraeten was born in 1921. He is an actor, known for Alicia (1974), Dakota (1974) and Don't Worry Too Much (1975).
biography.name: Bob Verstraeten

biography.bio: Marlies van Alcmaer was born on January 30, 1938 in Alkmaar, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Margaretha Elisabeth Wilhelmina Smal. She is an actress, known for A Bridge Too Far (1977), Westenwind (1999) and Q & Q (1974).
biography.name: Marlies van Alcmaer

biography.bio: Ramona Lucas is an actress, known for Dakota (1974).
biography.name: Ramona Lucas

biography.bio: Eddy Lobo is an actor, known for Dakota (1974) and The Obsessed One (1974).
biography.name: Eddy Lobo
